didactalia.title: Didactalia
didactalia.description: More than 500 games with physical, political, gentilic, environmental, historical maps, ...
didactalia.author: Didactalia

geosapiens-web.title: GeoSapiens Web
geosapiens-web.description: Test your knowledge of geography, physics, politics, and landscape.
geosapiens-web.author: National Geographic Institute of Spain

geography-games-ign.title: Geography games
geography-games-ign.description: Six games to practice essential geographic terms for the Spanish University Admission Tests
geography-games-ign.author: National Geographic Institute of Spain

old-cartography-ign.title: Old cartography
old-cartography-ign.description: Eleven puzzles made with old maps. Configurable difficulty (24 pieces desired).
old-cartography-ign.author: National Geographic Institute of Spain

appangea.title: APPangea
appangea.description: Learn Geography and History from your mobile or tablet device by answering questions and competing with other people.
appangea.author: Anonymous teachers

thinkmaps-puzzle.title: Do you know Europe?
thinkmaps-puzzle.description: Drag countries to their correct position on the map
thinkmaps-puzzle.author: Stephan Mendler

geojigsaw-esri.title: Jigsaw Puzzle
geojigsaw-esri.description: Configure the puzzle to your needs by choosing the location, size, difficulty, ...
geojigsaw-esri.author: Esri

mappuzzle.title: MapPuzzle.xyz
mappuzzle.description: Eleven puzzles to test your knowledge about world borders, American states, Spanish provinces, ...
mappuzzle.author: Alejandro Aranda

seterra.title: Seterra
seterra.description: Locate countries, capitals, cities, rivers, lakes and much more on a map.
seterra.author: Seterra geography games

find-the-country-capital.title: Find the ...
find-the-country-capital.description: Play to find the locations of countries or capitals in Europe.
find-the-country-capital.author: Adam Hamer

wordle.title: WORDLE
wordle.description: Play to find the country represented each day according to its shape in six attempts. Each failure indicates the distance and direction of the country to guess.
wordle.author: @teuteuf

globle-game.title: Globle Game
globle-game.description: Play to find the daily mystery country. Each bug is colored indicating the distance to the mystery country.
globle-game.author: The Abe Train

google-carmen-sandiego.title: Carmen Sandiego
google-carmen-sandiego.description: Use your knowledge to find Carmen Sandiego or any of her countless henchmen.
google-carmen-sandiego.author: Google

name-that-landmark.title: Name that landmark
name-that-landmark.description: Scratch quickly to determine the name of the monument.
name-that-landmark.author: Esri UK

geoguessr.title: GeoGuessr
geoguessr.description: Geography game which takes you on a journey around the world and challenges your ability to recognize your surroundings
geoguessr.author: Anton Wall√©n

city-guesser.title: City-Guesser
city-guesser.description: Guess what city it is by looking at a floor plan with road infrastructure, parks, rivers and little else. Ideal if you like urban planning and cities
city-guesser.author: Jeff Allen

posio.title: Posio
posio.description: Multiplayer game where you have to wait for the time to answer where the city you are asked for is located. Points are given according to how close you point.
posio.author: Arthur Brenaut

quizzity.title: Quizzity
quizzity.description: You have to point out six cities in the world. You get more points the less kilometers there are between the real location and the one you indicate.
quizzity.author: David Peter

planemad.title: PlaneMad
planemad.description: Guess the country using quick context clues; but be careful, because sometimes the map is rotated to mislead you!
planemad.author: Arun Ganesh

click-that-hood.title: Click that hood
click-that-hood.description: Game based on open data with +260 maps to learn about neighbourhoods of cities, states, ... The faster you answer, the better!
click-that-hood.author: Code for America

quiz-map-world-city-soviet-cold-war-spy.title: Cold war Soviet spy map

the-view-from-above.title: The View from Above
the-view-from-above.description: Guess to which country the shown satellite image belongs. There are levels and lives (Google watermarked)
the-view-from-above.author: Quartz

back-off-your-hand.title: Back of your hand ü§ö
back-off-your-hand.description: Guess the location of 5 streets in an urban area of your choice (home, work, ...). Do you really know it like the back of your hand?
back-off-your-hand.author: Adam Lynch

guess-where.title: Guess Where?
guess-where.description: An interactive geo quiz game app. Guess the unmarked capital city from given choices
guess-where.author: Jabran Rafique

virtualvacation-guess.title: City Guesser (VirtualVacation)
virtualvacation-guess.description: Guess your location by watching a video. Multiple categories: monuments, places in the world, in the USA and in Europe.
virtualvacation-guess.author: Paul McBurney

mapstd.title: mapstd
mapstd.description: A tower defense game. Choose a location defend it from attackers by strategically placing defense towers.
mapstd.author: Duncan Barclay

earth-nose-game.title: Earth nose game
earth-nose-game.description: Point out the city of a country by rotating a globe üåé with the NOSE üëÉ by moving your head in front of the PC or mobile camera

countryle.title: Countryle
countryle.description: Another geographical version of Wordle. Try it with a country and follow the clues
countryle.author: Unknown

eoguesser.description: Another version of Wordle. Each day there are 3 attempts to locate a city from an image üõ∞Ô∏è. Hints: quadrant / hemisphere / distance
eoguesser.author: EOX IT Services GmbH

ughent-map.title: Ghent University Map
ughent-map.description: Most of us have distorted ideas about the relative sizes between countries. And this game-survey puts you to the test in 12 cases
ughent-map.author: Ghent University, Belgium

traveling-salesman-problem.title: Traveling Salesman Problem
traveling-salesman-problem.description: Math problem with applications in logistics, planning, urbanism... Find out the shortest path that joins the points.
traveling-salesman-problem.author: University of Waterloo, Canada
